description:
The plugin revolutionizes the way you access your accounts by offering seamless entry through various platforms. With just a few clicks, you can log in using your GitHub, Twitter, Discord, or phone number, bypassing the need for traditional passwords. This innovative plugin streamlines your login process, ensuring a secure and user-friendly experience every time.

name: Stytch Passwordless Login
plugin_instructions: Add the Stytch SDK element to your page, select the platforms you need, and utilize its events and actions.
